Name: Flamingo No. 2
Ingredients: 30 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof /50% alc./vol.)
22.5 ml Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters optional
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker.
Review: This Flamingo's not pink but it is suited to a couple of dashes Creole-style bitters that impart a slight red tinge.
Nutrition: One serving of Flamingo No. 2 contains 169 calories
